instructions: Click Next: Verify your account . Enter your phone number. If you've previously verified a phone number for Google, you may see your verified phone number already entered for you. You can choose to use this phone number and skip the rest of the phone verification process, or enter a new number. Choose whether you d like to receive your verification code by text message (SMS) or voice call. Click Continue . You should soon be contacted by the method you selected in the previous step. Enter the 6-digit verification code that you received and click Verify . If you didn't receive the PIN, you can click Request new PIN to try again.
